Greetings from Funraise.me!

Thank you for using our products and services ("Services"). By using our Services, you are agreeing to the following Terms of Agreement ("Agreement"), so please read them carefully.

If you have any questions about this Agreement or our Privacy Policy, would like a history of revisions, or seek changes, please refer to our repository at https://github.com/funraiseme/documents.

User Agreement

You agree to follow all rules within this Agreement, as well as any rules written in our wiki. If you do not agree to any of these terms, do not use our services.

You may use our Services only permitted by law. Failure to do so will result in account termination.

You may not use content from our Services unless you obtain permission from its owner or are otherwise permitted by law.

You may not use any of Our brandings or logos used in our Services.

You may not remove, obscure, or alter any legal notices display in or along with our Services or any other laws mentioned in our Wiki.

Termination

Failure to comply with these terms will result in account termination. In the event of termination, your data will be anonymized, and any remaining balance available in your account will be donated to a charity of Our choosing.

Our Agreement

We agree to collect, allocate, and distribute funds to other charities to the best of our ability and in a reasonable time.

Copyright

All content used in our Services belongs to its rightful copyright owner.
